job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Artifact is looking for data scientists and NLP researchers at various skill levels to join our growing teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtKey ML Focus AreasltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtNatural language processingltligtltligtNatural language understandingltligtltligtKnowledge Graphs and Graph Neural NetworksltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Be DoingltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBy using massive amounts of historical and realtime qualitative data you will help research develop and automate models for semantic understanding text similarities clustering sentiment and emotion and expressive summarizationltligtltulgtltligtOne example Build  Enhance our endtoend solution that analyzes historical customer conversations and answers user questions as a summarized insight Beyond answering allow the user to facet and pivot the data while updating the summary insight dynamicallyltligtltulgtltligtWork with product management and design roles to understand and empathize with end customer needsltligtltligtBuild endtoend ML solutions spanning from data access SQL to model endpoint API  batch service and deploy to cloud based staging environments Kubernetes on GCP by collaborating with software engineersltligtltligtCollaborate with our academic partners and research new ML techniques  enhancements and publish blogs or journal  conference papersltligtltligtOpen source code or software that will benefit the larger community of ML practitionersltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtIdeal CandidateltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtHas solid fundamentals in approaching and solving ML  DS problems Think data source data lineage data transformation data age and relevance model consumption post consumption action etcltligtltligtLeans towards action and experimentation with a priority towards rapid prototypingltligtltligtApproaches problems from a first principles mindset and question assumptionsltligtltligtHas dived deep and spent a good amount of time solving one ML problemltligtltligtIs naturally curious and willing to take a step to learn something they dont have experience inltligtltligtHas experience with SQL Python NLTK or Spacy or other NLP libraries PyTorch or JAX or TensorFlow DGL and data visualization experience is a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtExperience BonusltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMasters Degree or PhD in Computational Linguistics Engineering Statistics or related fieldltligtltligtPrevious experienceeducation in syntax semantics and morphologyltligtltligtExperience with semantic understanding and summarization of short phrases across a heterogenous corpusltligtltligtExperience collaborating with software development teams data scientists business intelligence or other technical rolesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtCompany BenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtNocost insurance premiums We cover the cost of your medical dental and vision insurance premiumsltligtltligtFlexible insurance options We offer EPO POS FSA plans and HDHP coverage for you to choose from Everyones situation is differentltligtltligt401k plan We want you to be physically emotionally and financially secureltligtltligtCorporate expense card Every employee gets a corporate expense card to use because youre an adult Unless youre a child prodigy and then well talk about itltligtltligtBrand new equipment Well pay for your work equipment and machinesltligtltligtFlexible work environment Were a distributed company We know schedules and environments are different for everyone We dont hold office hours we just trust youll make appropriate agreements with your teamltligtltligtMonthly activity Expense up to 100 each month on activities dinner movie skiing boating golfing etcltligtltligtOffice snack Expense up to 25 each month on snacks for your home officeltligtltligtLibrary card Expense your Audible Premium membership or spend up to 15 each month on booksltligtltligtCell phone reimbursement Expense up to 100 each month on your phone billltligtltulgt
